main.name: Andrew Whelan
main.description: Data driven and working to glean insights in buisness processes. Relentless improver. Constant Learner
main.bio: Comfortable using React, MongoDB, and JS for web dev work and pandas, scikit-learn and Python for Data Science. Confident managing large projects and agile teams.

education.description: Studied Chemistry, including organic, inorganic, and quantitative analysis.
Part time remote course to learn the fundementals of Data Science. Mostly using Pandas and Scikit-learn
Recieved Certifications in JavaScript Alogrithms and Data Structures, Responsive Web Design, and Front End Libraries.

work.title: Implementation Project Manager
work.description: Led enterprise-level software implementations, as well as built buisness intellegence dashboards and coordinated weekly development cycle.

work.title: Project Manager
work.description: Started working on database solution for Real Estate Team. Later, I led the aquisition of over 100 utility-pole based telecom facilities. Was responsible for coordinating the entire utlity-pole program to meet timeline expectations.

projects.title: NASA and SpaceX API Showcase
projects.category: Reactive web app that shows latest data from NASA and SpaceX APIs

projects.category: API I worked on to deliver up-to-date information about Rocket Lab Launches

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
